channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Stock market today: World shares are mixed ahead of Fed meeting, as Germany’s growth stalls
item.description: World shares are mixed ahead of key central bank meetings around the world. Benchmarks in France and Germany rose early Tuesday despite the release of data showing that Germany’s economy contracted in the last quarter.

item.title: Income gap between Black and white US residents shrank between Gen Xers and millennials, study says
item.description: The income gap between white and Black young adults was narrower for millennials than it was for Generation X.

item.title: The top prosecutor where George Floyd was murdered is facing backlash. But she has vowed to endure
item.description: The prosecutor elected in George Floyd’s county after his murder is facing fierce backlash not even halfway into her term.
